languages.text: "Это прискорбно. Но вы не должны перекладывать на святых отцов тяжесть бремени праведной жизни. Кого вы будете винить, когда чудовища полезут из украденных у еретиков амулетов? Святого отца, которого не оказалось рядом, или мародера, который навлек беду на себя и соседей?"

"That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbours?"
languages.original_text: "Это прискорбно. Но вы не должны перекладывать на святых отцов тяжесть бремени праведной жизни. Кого вы будете винить, когда чудовища полезут из украденных у еретиков амулетов? Святого отца, которого не оказалось рядом, или мародера, который навлек беду на себя и соседей?"

traits.locale_text: "That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbors?"

"That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbors?"

"That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbors?"

"That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbours?"

languages.text: “这真是太令人遗憾了。不过，过上诚实的人生是你们自己的责任，不能把这些责任丢到神父的肩上。当那群怪物从偷来的异端护身符中爬出来的时候，你们会觉得是谁的错？是不在场的神父吗？还是那些将邪恶之物招致而来的拾荒人？”
languages.original_text: "That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbours?"

traits.locale_text: “这真是太令人遗憾了。不过，过上诚实的人生是你们自己的责任，不能把这些责任丢到神父的肩上。当那群怪物从偷来的异端护身符中爬出来的时候，你们会觉得是谁的错？是不在场的神父吗？还是那些将邪恶之物招致而来的拾荒人？”

languages.text: «Eso es una lástima, pero no podéis depender de los sagrados padres para vivir una vida recta. ¿A quién culparéis cuando las bestias escapen de esos amuletos que habéis robado a los herejes? ¿Al sagrado padre que no estaba allí o al saqueador que guio al mal hasta sí mismo y sus vecinos?».
languages.original_text: "That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbours?"

traits.locale_text: «Eso es una lástima, pero no podéis depender de los sagrados padres para vivir una vida recta. ¿A quién culparéis cuando las bestias escapen de esos amuletos que habéis robado a los herejes? ¿Al sagrado padre que no estaba allí o al saqueador que guio al mal hasta sí mismo y sus vecinos?».

languages.text: 「それは残念なことだ。だが、正しい生活を送るという重荷を、聖なる父祖たちの肩に負わせることはできない。あなたが異端者から盗んだお守りから獣が這い出てきたら、誰のせいにするというのだ？その場にいなかった聖なる父祖か、それともあなたと隣人に災いをもたらしたスカベンジャーか？」
languages.original_text: "That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbours?"

traits.locale_text: 「それは残念なことだ。だが、正しい生活を送るという重荷を、聖なる父祖たちの肩に負わせることはできない。あなたが異端者から盗んだお守りから獣が這い出てきたら、誰のせいにするというのだ？その場にいなかった聖なる父祖か、それともあなたと隣人に災いをもたらしたスカベンジャーか？」

languages.text: "Das ist bedauerlich. Doch Ihr könnt die Last, ein rechtschaffenes Leben zu führen, nicht den heiligen Vätern aufhalsen. Wem gebt Ihr die Schuld, wenn Ungeheuer aus den Amuletten kriechen, die Ihr den Ketzern gestohlen habt? Dem heiligen Vater, der nicht hier war, oder dem Dieb, der das Böse auf sich und seine Nachbarn gehetzt hat?"
languages.original_text: "That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbours?"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist bedauerlich. Doch Ihr könnt die Last, ein rechtschaffenes Leben zu führen, nicht den heiligen Vätern aufhalsen. Wem gebt Ihr die Schuld, wenn Ungeheuer aus den Amuletten kriechen, die Ihr den Ketzern gestohlen habt? Dem heiligen Vater, der nicht hier war, oder dem Dieb, der das Böse auf sich und seine Nachbarn gehetzt hat?"

languages.text: « C'est malheureux, mais ce n'est pas aux saints pères de veiller en permanence à ce que vous restiez dans le droit chemin. Qui accuserez-vous quand des monstres surgiront des amulettes que vous avez dérobées aux hérétiques ? Le prédicateur qui était absent, ou bien le pilleur de cadavres coupable d'avoir fait entrer le loup dans la bergerie ? »
languages.original_text: "That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbours?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est malheureux, mais ce n'est pas aux saints pères de veiller en permanence à ce que vous restiez dans le droit chemin. Qui accuserez-vous quand des monstres surgiront des amulettes que vous avez dérobées aux hérétiques ? Le prédicateur qui était absent, ou bien le pilleur de cadavres coupable d'avoir fait entrer le loup dans la bergerie ? »

languages.text: "Hayli müessif. Fakat dürüstçe bir yaşam sürmenin yükünü kutsal babaların omuzlarına yükleyemezsiniz. Kâfirlerden çaldığınız o uğurluklardan canavarlar çıkınca kimi suçlayacaksınız? Aranızda olmayan kutsal babaları mı yoksa kendisiyle komşularının başına bu belayı açan yağmacıyı mı?"
languages.original_text: "That is regrettable. But you cannot lay the burden of leading a righteous life on the shoulders of the holy fathers. Who will you blame when beasts crawl out of those amulets you stole from the heretics? The holy father who was not there, or the scavenger who brought evil down on himself and his neighbours?"

traits.locale_text: "Hayli müessif. Fakat dürüstçe bir yaşam sürmenin yükünü kutsal babaların omuzlarına yükleyemezsiniz. Kâfirlerden çaldığınız o uğurluklardan canavarlar çıkınca kimi suçlayacaksınız? Aranızda olmayan kutsal babaları mı, yoksa kendinin ve komşularının başına bu belayı açan yağmacıyı mı?"
